refnamediv.refpurpose: checks if an object is a non-empty 1D or 2D matrix or array

listitem.para: scalar,vector, matrix, hypermatrix, list, array of structures or of cells

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
ismatrix(x)
returns %T (true) if x is a scalar (single component), or a vector or a matrix or array with one or 2 dimensions.

itemizedlist.listitem: An hypermatrix that would be a matrix after reordering its dimensions is considered as a matrix.
To test that x is not an hypermatrix or an hyperarray -- whatever are the sizes of its dimensions --, use simply ndims(x)<3.
